EmailTemplate.subject: OFFER OF RE-ADMISSION TO MONASH – {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I am pleased to advise you that the Academic Director has approved your application for re-admission. This email correspondence details important information to assist in your re-admission to your degree at Monash University.
Please find attached an electronic copy of your Letter of Candidature Offer for your postgraduate study. Please note that we will not be sending any hard copies by post.
Action Required:
In order to accept your offer and enrol, please submit your acceptance form together with all the enrolment documents to us at MGE front counter or via email mge-candidature@monash.edu
If you have new arrangements affecting IP and or ethics, you must submit new completed forms at the time of enrolment. To assist you we have attached copies of intellectual property and ethics clearance forms with this offer. If there are no changes then you do not have to complete these forms.
It is important that you take some time to carefully read the conditions on your offer and ensure that you understand and meet these requirements either at acceptance or at enrolment, as your enrolment will not be completed, until all conditions are met.
When you have completed your enrolment and organised your student card, you may register for 24-hour access to the Monash Graduate Research Centre via the Registration Process.
Once you have accepted your offer, and require any further assistance or should you have any concerns or queries please send an email to: mge-candidature@monash.edu
We are here to assist you and I am looking forward to you being part of the Monash research community again.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
